trans-unit.source: Represents XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metadane XML lub odwołania do metadanych XML.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSection class conforms to the definition of the `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` element in the WS-Metadata Exchange specification and contains XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Klasa MetadataSection odpowiada definicji `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` elementu w specyfikacji WS-Metadata Exchange i zawiera XML metadanych lub odwołania do metadanych XML.

trans-unit.source: A MetadataSection object contains one dialect of metadata in XML form (such as a Web Services Description Language or WSDL file).
trans-unit.target: Obiekt MetadataSection zawiera jeden dialekt metadanych w postaci XML (na przykład plik Web Services Description Language lub WSDL).

trans-unit.source: You can add a MetadataSection to a collection of XML metadata represented by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: MetadataSection można dodać do kolekcji XML metadanych reprezentowany przez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>obiektu.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Much of the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metadata system, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> class, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class to import or export service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Większość [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system metadanych, takich jak <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>klasy, należy użyć <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>klasy do importowania lub eksportowania metadanych usługi w postaci XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: For example, to export [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] contract or endpoint objects to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object that contains the equivalent metadata in XML form, call the appropriate Export methods on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class, passing either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects, and then call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład, aby wyeksportować [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kontraktu lub punkt końcowy obiektów do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>obiekt, który zawiera równoważne metadanych w postaci XML wywołać odpowiednie metody eksportu w <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>klasy, przekazując albo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>obiektów, a następnie wywołania <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A>metody.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: To import XML-based metadata from a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object into [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects, pass a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object to the constructor of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> class and call one of the import methods.
trans-unit.target: Można zaimportować metadanych opartych na języku XML z <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>obiekt do [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>obiektów, Przekaż <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>obiekt do konstruktora obiektu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>klasy i wywołania jednej z metod import.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class with no dialect, identifier, or XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> klasy bez dialekt, identyfikator lub XML metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class using the specified dialect, identifier, and XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> przy użyciu określonego dialektu, identyfikator i XML metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Use the MetadataSection constructor to specify the metadata to be included in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, its dialect and its identifier.
trans-unit.target: Umożliwia określenie metadanych, które mają zostać uwzględnione w tym konstruktorze MetadataSection <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, jego dialekt i jego identyfikator.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The metadata object must be serializable using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class so that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> object can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt metadanych musi być możliwy do serializacji przy użyciu <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>klasy, aby <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>można zserializować obiektu.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If it is not serializable, an exception is thrown when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie jest możliwy do serializacji, jest wyjątek podczas serializowany jest obiekt.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> object for the `metadata` parameter if you want to include a reference to the metadata instead of the metadata itself.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>obiekt do `metadata` parametru, jeśli chcesz dołączyć odwołanie do metadanych zamiast metadanych samego.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>

trans-unit.source: The dialect of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt metadanych.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Metadane XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of XML attributes that you can use to add or remove attributes extensions to the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję atrybutów XML, które umożliwiają dodawanie lub usuwanie rozszerzeń atrybutów metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Use the Attributes property to add or remove attribute extensions.
trans-unit.target: Aby dodać lub usunąć atrybut rozszerzenia, należy użyć właściwości atrybutów.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The dialect and identifier attributes are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dialekt i identyfikator atrybuty nie są uwzględnione w tej kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The collection of XML attributes for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atrybuty kolekcji XML <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Domyślna kolekcja jest pusta.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified policy information.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> z informacji w określonych zasad.

trans-unit.source: Use CreateFromPolicy method to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Tworzenie przy użyciu metody CreateFromPolicy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>wyrażenie zasad protokołu WS-Policy.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> and the `identifier` is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>Ma ustawioną wartość właściwości <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>i `identifier` jest przypisany do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recommend identifier is the `wsp:Name` attribute for the policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator zalecane jest `wsp:Name` atrybutu wyrażenie zasad.

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of a policy as defined in WS-Policy.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentacja XML zasad zgodnie z definicją w WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the policy.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator zasad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified policy expression with the specified identifier.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> zawiera wyrażenie określonych zasad o podanym identyfikatorze.

trans-unit.source: The XML element is not a policy element.
trans-unit.target: XML element nie jest elementem zasad.

trans-unit.source: The policy is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zasady są <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> z określonego <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Szybko utworzyć przy użyciu tej metody statycznej fabryki <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>dla dokumentu schematu XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>Właściwości jest przypisywana wartość <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>Właściwości jest przypisana wartość docelowa przestrzeń nazw dokumentu schematu XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Dokument schematu XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> containing the specified XML schema.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> zawierających określony schemat XML.

trans-unit.source: The schema is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Schemat jest <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> zawierający określony <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Szybko utworzyć przy użyciu tej metody statycznej fabryki <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>dla dokumentu WSDL.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>Właściwości jest przypisywana wartość <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>Właściwości jest przypisana wartość docelowa przestrzeń nazw dokument WSDL.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> used to create a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> Używany do tworzenia <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> zawierający określony <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serviceDescription is .
trans-unit.target: The serviceDescription is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość, która wskazuje typ metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The dialect indicates the type of metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt wskazuje typ metadanych w tym <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The dialect strings with supported object models are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>
trans-unit.target: Ciągi dialekt z modeli obiektów obsługiwane są:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dialect for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Wartość domyślna to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia identyfikator metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator metadanych w tym <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The value depends on the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Wartość zależy od typu metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Wartość domyślna to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contained metadata object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia obiekt zawartych w niej metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Use the Metadata property to access or modify the metadata content contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: Użyj właściwości metadanych dostępu lub modyfikacji metadanych zawarte w <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> zawartości

trans-unit.source: The metadata object can be <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> or a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> as a reference to the metadata content.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt metadanych może być <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>jako odwołanie do metadanych zawartości.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> is deserialized, the type of the metadata object is determined from the XML content.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>jest deserializacji, typ obiektu metadanych jest określana na podstawie zawartości XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values.
trans-unit.target: W poniższej tabeli opisano możliwe wartości zwracane.

trans-unit.source: |Type of XML metadata|Returned type| |--------------------------|-------------------| |WSDL document|<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| |XML Schema|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata reference|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata location|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| |Policy, and all other XML content|<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | Typ XML metadanych | Zwracany typ | |--------------------------|-------------------| | Dokument WSDL | <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| | Schemat XML | <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| | Odwołanie do metadanych | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| | Metadane lokalizacji | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| | Zasady i innej zawartości XML | <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The metadata contents for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zawartość metadanych dla tego <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the metadata exchange dialect.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera wartość dialekt wymiany metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt dla dokumentu WS-Metadata Exchange.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt dla dokumentu WS-Metadata Exchange.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the WS-Policy dialect.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera wartość dialekt WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt wyrażenia zasad protokołu WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt wyrażenia zasad protokołu WS-Policy.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dialect.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera wartość dialekt Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: The dialect.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt dla dokumentu WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the XML Schema dialect.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera wartość dialekt schematu XML.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt dla dokumentu schematu XML.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Dialekt dla dokumentu schematu XML.
